ddl:
CREATE TABLE DEV_APP_DOMAIN(
  ID VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL  COMMENT 'ID' ,
  APP_ID VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL  COMMENT '所属应用' ,
  DISPLAY_NAME VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL  COMMENT '显示名称' ,
  NAME VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL  COMMENT '编码' ,
  constraint uk_dev_app_domain_appid_name unique (APP_ID,NAME),
  constraint PK_dev_app_domain primary key (ID)
)
alter table DEV_APP add CODE VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL  COMMENT '编码'
alter table DEV_APP add DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(500)   COMMENT '说明'
alter table DEV_APP drop column CODE1
alter table DEV_APP  alter column  ID VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL  COMMENT '主键'
alter table DEV_APP  alter column  CREATED_AT TIMESTAMP NOT NULL  default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP  COMMENT '创建时间'
alter table DEV_APP  alter column  DISPLAY_NAME VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL  COMMENT '名称'
alter table DEV_APP  alter column  VERSION VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL  default '1.0.0'  COMMENT '版本号'
alter table DEV_APP   add constraint uk_dev_app_code     unique (CODE)
alter table DEV_APP_DICT   drop constraint UK_DEV_APP_DICT_APPID_NAME
alter table DEV_APP_DICT   drop constraint UK_DEV_APP_DICT_APPID_DISPLAYNAME
alter table DEV_APP_DICT drop column DISPLAY_NAME
alter table DEV_APP_DICT  alter column  DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(500)   COMMENT '说明'
alter table DEV_APP_DICT   add constraint UK_DEV_APP_DICT_APPID_NAME     unique (APP_ID,NAME)
